Reviews.Title: Does what I need it to do
Reviews.Author: Myra Gideon "Myra Hobbit"
Reviews.Content: If you're in the market for a basic Android tablet that is wi-fi only, this fills the bill.  I use it at work as an organizer, I read books and magazines on it, and I have a few games on it that I play occasionally. Battery life is about 6 hours, which usually is sufficient for a workday.I love the case with keyboard, too.

Reviews.Title: Sleek
Reviews.Author: David A.
Reviews.Content: I did some research before deciding on this tablet.  Other brands did not have the Google Play Store feature, but this one does.  I can download all the apps and watch Youtube on this tablet.  I really like the sleek design, very sharp looking and light.  This tablet is actually faster than I expected, disregarding the speed of your internet connection.

Reviews.Title: I so love this tablet
Reviews.Author: K.J
Reviews.Content: I purchase thi tablet for my 5 year old daughter and she absolutely loves it. So far I have no issues with it "I have only had it 2 days now" lol. But it was everything I was expecting. Shipping time was very fast as a matter of fact i got it a day earlier than expected. It even came with a 8GB sd card and for only 90.00 bucks this is a very good tablet for the money.

Reviews.Title: One week entertainment
Reviews.Author: Teresa
Reviews.Content: Went great for a week then went to go and charge it and it wouldn't charge, Tried another way to charge and still wouldn't work. Wont waste my time on this again.

Reviews.Title: aweful
Reviews.Author: janaa proctor
Reviews.Content: I rated this with a one star because less then a month later the usb connector is loose. I have to go through the most to get it to charge and when its says its charging it continuously dies,how is that possible if its "charging"? The list goes on!!!!! I would tell EVERYBODY to stay away!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: not good at all!!!
Reviews.Author: yared
Reviews.Content: it worked for  the first two days,then stopped working! I returned it!! I don't recommend for no one this tablet!

Reviews.Title: Ok bad battery
Reviews.Author: Sandy B
Reviews.Content: I don't know about others but this only hade a battery life of 1hr 5min in my book that is not very good.

Reviews.Title: not very happy
Reviews.Author: crazycrystald
Reviews.Content: after charging it for 10 hours battery life only lasted for 1 to 1 .5 charged battery 3 time for no lease then 8 to 10 hours and still only lasted for no more then 1.5 hours. this was not even being online ! all so because not amazon prime seller has you pay for return shipping to manufatuer

Reviews.Title: Its okay
Reviews.Author: Timir Dukhbhanjan
Reviews.Content: Tablet was received in good condition,charged it up as per instructions.The image is ok,but not crisp.I have to be close to my router for internet to work.Sound level is very low.Overall the product is just ok.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Danielledavis
Reviews.Content: Good quality and recieved it quickly. My daughter is having a lot of fun with it and cant wait to see how it does on our vacation.

Reviews.Title: It stop working
Reviews.Author: angela johnson
Reviews.Content: At first it was just shutting off. Then it just would not cut on at all. Now my daughter can't use it.

Reviews.Title: Worst Tablet Ever
Reviews.Author: Chanel
Reviews.Content: This tablet is cheap for a reason do not buy this tablet the charger stop working the tablet would not charge and the sd card was not working save your money and go buy a tablet thats worth spending your money Doesn't even deserve one star.

Reviews.Title: Not recommended
Reviews.Author: Roxanne M. Burnett
Reviews.Content: Tablet came in foam and in a plain brown box. It would hold a good charge the first four days but after that, no matter what you were doing on the tablet, it will only hold a charge for about 30 minutes. Due to the lack of holding a charge, it makes the tablet hard to use anywhere but home.

Reviews.Title: great for kids
Reviews.Author: April Davis
Reviews.Content: You shouldn't exspect a masterpiece of equipment for 60 bucks. That's why I got it for a 12 year old. It does what it needs to do movies games and wifi. If you want something more you gotta pay more. Battery life's short but that's about the time he needs to turn the thing of anyway.

Reviews.Title: did not keep a charge
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Broke with in a weekdid not chargeWould not turn onneed better charging supportI I I l

Reviews.Title: looked cheap
Reviews.Author: denise lopez
Reviews.Content: it looked very cheap and would not turn on after left charged a whole entire day would not recommend purchase

Reviews.Title: tablet
Reviews.Author: Felisha Arnold
Reviews.Content: My son received the tablet for Christmas and he loves it!!! He carries it with him all the time and he uses it daily

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: feefee40
Reviews.Content: Great tablet for my granddaughter age 7. Unfortunately charger does not connect very well and it is very hard to recharge the tablet.

Reviews.Title: SVP 7"
Reviews.Author: Renee Chabot
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, plenty of storage, can use any standard 7' cases.Charges quickly, holds a charge for an extended period of time.Yes I would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablets
Reviews.Author: buffy kimbrough
Reviews.Content: Got 2 of these for my kids for christmas. They loved them. Now they dont have to fight over my tablet

Reviews.Title: SMH
Reviews.Author: LOVELY25
Reviews.Content: CAME APART IN 3 DAYS.DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY! I WAS SO DISPPIONTED  AND SO WAS MY SON. I BOUGHT HIM ONE AS WELL. IT WAS A WASTE OF TIME AND MONEY

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: Cotezz Childers
Reviews.Content: PICE OF S*** ARRIVED BROKEN DONT WAST YOUR MONEY BUY THE NERO TAB ITS A LOT BETTER QUALITY AND PRICE

Reviews.Title: Not as Expected
Reviews.Author: Sandra
Reviews.Content: I am disappointed with theproduct.  The battery life is less than acceptable. Only lasts about an hour-great for a child playing games but not for professional business use.  Also when you charge it, the charge is always at 93% never at 100%.

Reviews.Title: Just Wonderful!!!
Reviews.Author: Kerima Smith
Reviews.Content: I was extremely pleased with this purchase. I got three because the price was very affordable at $59.00 and it works great!!!. Thanks amazon please bring more deals.

Reviews.Title: Broke after 2 weeks of light use
Reviews.Author: Mako Cruz
Reviews.Content: After two week of light use battery don't work, only works with cable plugged. I use it only to play games with my daugther and I don't left her along with the tablet. I can't return it becouse I live outside the USA, so I lost my money.

Reviews.Title: Ok for the price
Reviews.Author: C burns
Reviews.Content: Product had scratch and case had cut area. But not bad for the price and for a 7 year old

Reviews.Title: Product Worked Fine
Reviews.Author: Kendall76
Reviews.Content: I received the TPC0751 PC Tablet and it worked fine. Had no problems so far. It supports google play store. The storage available with the 8GB micro SD Card is approximately 9GB (1 Gb internal storage free and 8Gb SD Card) with all the software installed not 12GB as the 4GB internal storage is basically taken up with the software that comes with the device. The only other problem is the the manual was very poorly written (obviously written by someone who does not speak english well) and not very helpful in showing how to use the device. But it was worth the price paid.

Reviews.Title: 7" flop
Reviews.Author: Jeff Biszantz
Reviews.Content: I bought this unit, the battery life is very poor. Runs down in less than an hour after charging all night. In that hour  i checked e-mail and played 1 game. I would not recommend this unit to anyone, keep looking. If I could I would have returned it. Time ran out of time to return, I was hoping it would improve. IT DIDN'T !!

Reviews.Title: Strongly urge do not waste time and money
Reviews.Author: Marlando Doyle "Mdiddy"
Reviews.Content: The price is misleading,  I bought this tablet for my 8 year son and within 2 days it was stuck on the android start up screen, it has no reset option it only has sequence of buttons to push that never got the job done. For the 2 days it did worked it had a slow response time, overall this is the worst tablet I ever purchased.

Reviews.Title: didnt work
Reviews.Author: rosangelina palacio
Reviews.Content: it just didn't work when I received it that's all it probably was a broken item im sure it would have been good if it had worked properly!
